0.name: Balanced
0.description: Minor adjustments from the traditional rules to make the game more balanced. The most appropriate rule set for competition.

1.name: Traditional
1.description: The earliest documented set of rules for this card game.

0.name: Quick Play (1 Round Only)
0.description: 1 Round only, may end in a tie.

1.name: Short (First to win a round)
1.description: First player to win a round is declared the winner. Rounds that end in a tie are ignored.

2.name: Normal (First to 2 Wins)
2.description: First player to win 2 rounds is declared the winner. Rounds that end in a tie are ignored.

3.name: Extended (First to 3 Wins)
3.description: First player to win 3 rounds is declared the winner. Rounds that end in a tie are ignored.

0.name: Disabled
0.description: When playing a 4 One-Off effect, the target player chooses which 2 cards to discard from their hand.

1.name: Enabled
1.description: When playing a 4 One-Off effect, the 2 cards to discard are chosen at random.

0.name: Disabled
0.description: When playing a 9 One-Off effect, the target card returns to the owner's hand.

1.name: Enabled
1.description: When playing a 9 One-Off effect, the target card goes on top of the draw pile.
